class.name: TokenFloatFull

var.name: radix
var.desc: The radix for all of this float's integer/fraction/exponent parts.

var.name: size
var.desc: The size of this float in bits. Can be zero to mean this float's size wasnt specified.

var.name: flagNumberNeg
var.desc: True if the integer/fraction, is negative.

var.name: flagExponentNeg
var.desc: True if the exponent is negative.

var.name: integer
var.desc: The integer before the radix point. Can be null.

var.name: fraction
var.desc: The integer after the radix point, which has this float's fractional digits. Can be null.

var.name: exponent
var.desc: The integer after the exponent mark, which has this float's exponent digits. Can be null.
